participant_1.background:
I love spending time with my alpacas.
i love christmas.
I've had my cards read a couple of times.
I take my dog for a walk after I wake up.
I'd like to be able to weld things.

participant_2.background:
I am used to waking up early for work, but I prefer to sleep in on my days off.
I have a collection of lullabies that I sing to my baby.
I enjoy listening to Jason Mraz's music to help me cope with the loss of my parents.
I'd love to share some of my crochet patterns with you!
I spent my summer nights at the coffee shop, watching the stars.

content.text: Hi there! My name is Chris, nice to meet you. What's your name?
Hello Chris, my name is Sara. It's nice to meet you too!
What's your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I love crocheting and spending time with my baby.
Those both sound like really great hobbies. I love spending time with my dog and my alpacas.
Alpacas! That's so cool! I've always wanted to see one in person.
They're really amazing animals. They're so soft and fluffy.
I bet they are! I love animals. They're so cute and cuddly.
Me too! I'm a big animal lover.
I have a collection of lullabies that I sing to my baby.
That's so sweet! I love that.
I also enjoy listening to Jason Mraz's music to help me cope with the loss of my parents.
I'm so sorry to hear that. I know how hard that can be.
Thank you. It's been a tough journey, but I'm getting through it.
I'm glad to hear that.
I appreciate your kind words.
No problem.
Thank you for taking the time to get to know me. It's been nice talking to you.
You too! I'm glad we met.
Me too!
